mission.title: Intego, Icyerekezo &
mission.subtitle: Menya icyo kidutuma gushyigikira igisekuru gishya cy'ubuhanga bw'umuziki mu burasirazuba bw'Afurika
mission.missionText: Muri SimpoPlanet Music Label, intego yacu ni ugushakisha no gushyigikira ubuhanga bushya bw'umuziki mu Rwanda no mu burasirazuba bw'Afurika. Twiyemeje guteza imbere abaririmbyi n'abakora umuziki bashya tubaha amahirwe yo gufata amajwi, gukora no kwamamaza mu buryo bwiza binyuze muri Simpo Studio.
mission.visionText: Icyerekezo cyacu ni ukuba ikigo cy'umuziki gikomeye mu burasirazuba bw'Afurika, kizwi no guteza imbere igisekuru gishya cy'ubuhanga bw'umuziki. Tugamije gushyiraho umuryango ukomeye w'abahanzi bashobora kwigaragaza mu bwisanzure kandi bagera ku banyamakuru ku isi yose binyuze mu kwiyemeza kwacu ku bwiza n'udushya.
mission.valuesSubtitle: Amahame y'ingenzi ayobora ibyemezo byacu kandi agashyiraho umuco wacu
mission.innovationDesc: Gusimbura imipaka y'ubuhanga mu gukora umuziki
mission.unityDesc: Kubaka amahuriro binyuze mu murage w'umuziki w'Afurika
mission.excellenceDesc: Kwiyemeza ku bipimo byo hejuru by'ubwiza
mission.ctaTitle: Witeguye Kuba Umwe mu Ntego Yacu?
mission.ctaText: Dufatanye mu gushyiraho ejo hazaza h'umuziki w'iburasirazuba bw'Afurika. Waba uri umuhanzi, umukora, cyangwa ukunda umuziki, hariho ahantu hawe mu muryango wacu.

about.title: Gushyiraho Ejo Hazaza h'
about.subtitle: Menya uburyo duhindura inganda z'umuziki mu Rwanda no hanze
about.description1: SimpoPlanet ni ikigo cy'umuziki gikomeye gikorera mu burasirazuba bw'Afurika, mu Rwanda, gifite intego yo gushakisha, guteza imbere no kwamamaza ubuhanga bushya mu nganda z'umuziki. Binyuze muri studio yacu ya Simpo ikomeye, dutanga ahantu h'ubuhanga aho abaririmbyi bashya n'abakora umuziki bashobora gukura, kwigaragaza no gusangira amajwi yabo n'isi yose.
about.description2: Muri SimpoPlanet, twizera imbaraga z'umuziki zo gushimangira no guhuza abantu. Twiyemeje gushyigikira igisekuru gishya cy'abahanzi tubaha ubuyobozi bwiza, ubukorikori bwo mu rwego rwo hejuru, n'ukumenyekana bakeneye kugera ku banyamakuru benshi.
about.ctaText: Dufatanye mu rugendo rwacu rwo gushyiraho ejo hazaza h'umuzikiâ€”umuhanzi umwe icyarimwe. Reka dukore ikintu gitangaje hamwe.

founder.title: Umuntu w'Icyerekezo Nyuma ya
founder.name: Simpo Savior
founder.quote: Umuziki ni intwaro kurwanya akababaro kandi ni ikiraro cy'ubumwe bw'Afurika.
founder.description1: Simpo Savior ni umuhanzi w'umuziki wa reggae wo mu Rwanda kandi ni umunyafurika ukomeye uvuga ko umuziki we ari uruvange rukomeye rw'injyana, kurwanya no gutekereza. Azwiho amagambo y'imbere n'ijwi ryiza, Simpo akoresha ijwi rye nk'intwaro kurwanya akababaro kandi nk'ikiraro cy'ubumwe bw'Afurika.
founder.description2: Ashingiye ku mwuka w'intwari za reggae ariko akaba yarahinduwe n'umurage we w'iburasirazuba bw'Afurika, Simpo Savior ahagaze nk'umwe mu majwi y'umuziki w'ubwenge mu Rwanda no hanze. Alubumu ye ya mbere itangaje "Africa, Why Do Your Profits Go Abroad?" yamushyizeho nk'umuhanzi gusa ahubwo n'umunyamakuru.

achievements.pioneerDesc: Ijwi ryambere mu muziki wa reggae w'iburasirazuba bw'Afurika

pr.name: Ladouce
pr.biography: Ladouce ni umukozi w'imimbanire n'abaturage ufite uburambe bw'imyaka 8 mu nganda z'umuziki. Yagenze neza mu gucunga ubukangurambaga bw'abahanzi benshi, abafasha kubaka ikirango cyabo no guhuza n'abayumva. Ubuhanga bwe bukubiyemo imimbanire n'itangazamakuru, ingamba z'ikirango, gucunga imbuga nkoranyambaga, n'itumanaho mu bihe by'ikibazo. Urukundo rwa Ladouce ku muziki n'uburyo bwe bw'ingamba byamugize umutungo w'agaciro ku bahanzi bashaka kuzamura ubwitonzi bwabo bw'abantu.

hero.title: Simpo Planet
hero.description: Gushakisha no guteza imbere ubuhanga budasanzwe mu burasirazuba bw'Afurika. Aho ubuhanga buhura n'amahirwe mu mutima w'umuziki w'u Rwanda.

producers.errorMessage: Byanze gupakurura amakuru y'umukora. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.

artists.noArtistsText: Garuka vuba kugira ngo ubone abahanzi bacu bakomeye

contact.title: Reka Dutangire
contact.subtitle: Witeguye kuzamura umuziki wawe ku rwego rwo hejuru? Twifuza kugira icyo tuvugana nawe kandi tuganire ku buryo dushobora kugufasha kuzuza icyerekezo cyawe.
contact.contactInfoDesc: Duhamagare binyuze mu makuru akurikira. Turi hano kugufasha gutsinda.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tubwire ku mushinga wawe, intego cyangwa ibibazo ufite...
